casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Thurman THOMAS, a/k/a Herman Thomas and Thomas Thurman, Defendant-Petitioner. C-1056 September Term 2017
080782 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 20, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001335-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
